description: To provide scholarships to UCO Students who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Must be a currently enrolled UCO student Must be a Mexican citizen or have at least one parent who is a Mexican citizen Must be in good academic standing (Cumulative 2.0 GPA) Preference also given to students who provide evidence of community involvement or have a desire to serve the Mexican community in conjunction with the Mexican Consulate in Little Rock, AR Preference given to students who have lived in the US for at least 5 years Preference given to students who have attended a US high school Preference given to students who have financial need Preference given to students who do not qualify for state or federal financial assistance Preference given to students who are members of a Diversity Round Table group or the International Student Council or a similar organization at a previous school, if a new student

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
